author: Elastic
description: Identifies native Windows host and network enumeration commands spawned by the Windows Management Instrumentation Provider Service (WMIPrvSE).
name: Enumeration Command Spawned via WMIPrvSE
query:
process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and
  process.name:
  (
    "arp.exe",
    "dsquery.exe",
    "dsget.exe",
    "gpresult.exe",
    "hostname.exe",
    "ipconfig.exe",
    "nbtstat.exe",
    "net.exe",
    "net1.exe",
    "netsh.exe",
    "netstat.exe",
    "nltest.exe",
    "ping.exe",
    "qprocess.exe",
    "quser.exe",
    "qwinsta.exe",
    "reg.exe",
    "sc.exe",
    "systeminfo.exe",
    "tasklist.exe",
    "tracert.exe",
    "whoami.exe"
  ) and
  process.parent.name:"wmiprvse.exe"
